import React from 'react'; import { FaUpload, FaUserEdit, FaUsers } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Dashboard() { return (

Welcome, Instructor!

This is your dashboard. Upload lessons, manage your profile, and more.

{/* Upload Lessons Card */}

Upload Lessons

Upload your sign language lessons and reach learners.

Go to Upload
{/* My Students Card */}

My Students

View and manage enrolled learners.

View Students
{/* Edit Profile Card */}

Edit Profile

Update your instructor bio and details.

Edit Profile
); } export default Dashboard;
